name: Samurai Vengeance
description:
Description

You, as the lone samurai, must fight you're way through enemy bandits while avoiding deadly falls and spikes. Collect as many coins you can along the way to see if you can get 'em all!

Controls

A -> Left

D-> Right

Space -> Jump

Space + Space -> Double Jump

Enter -> Attack

Press W when in front of a door to enter it

Credits

Created By: Scott Little
